div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 968 Lipnik, c. 30 km. E of Ruse, Bulgaria, 1950 Burial: early 1st cent. B.C. (T) Contents: 44 AR. Pot hoard Maroneia: 2 spread-flan tetradr. Thasos: 35 spread-flan tetradr. Imit. Thasos: 7 tetradr. Disposition: Varna 37 (2 Maroneia, 35 Thasos) Gerasimov, BIAB 18 (1952), p. 402
